Field Detail

states

private State[] states
This is the array of states for the StateMachine.

events

private Event[] events
This is the array of events for the StateMachien.

actionMatrix

private ActionList[][] actionMatrix
This is a matrix representing the action to execute if an object changes state. On the first dimensions there are the source state ids, and on the second the destination state ids.

transactionMatrix

private int[][] transactionMatrix
This is a matrix used to find the destination state given the source state and the event. On the first dimension there are the source state ides, and on the second the event ids.

stateIDTraslator

private int[] stateIDTraslator
This is an array used to normalize the states ids.

eventIDTraslator

private int[] eventIDTraslator
This is an array used to normalize the events ids.
